name: Drob
description:
Hi !

This game is for "Mini Jam 104: Cascade"

I'm kinda don't finish it, but I tried

The game is like "Dropper" maps from Minecraft

You are the glass orb and you need to fall down through the water and don't crush, and maybe also collect all emeralds( 6 ) what i added to game.

This in my third game, don't be very biased.

Controlls:

WASD or arrows - movement

R - restart

Esc - menu

----------------♡HaveFun♡----------------
